subject: Olympic Games (1972)
Basketball
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: A player called the Jerry West of Russia, Belov scored 20 points in the Soviets’ 51-50 victory over the United States in the 1972 Summer Games in Munich.
snippet: A player called the Jerry West of Russia, Belov scored 20 points in the Soviets’ 51-50 victory over the United States in the 1972 Summer Games in Munich.
